tests.name: Check letters classification 200 points
tests.run: curl -X POST https://functions.yandexcloud.net/d4en1ufd9vthf8hbrioc -d "repo_name=$( cat .repo_name )&result_points=200&max_invalid_letters_count=1000&submit=$( cat letters.csv | perl -pe 's/\n/%0D%0A/g' )" --fail-with-body
